fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • Sir Ben Helfgott, who arrived in the UK as a Jewish refugee in 1945, competed for Britain as an Olympic weightlifter, not wrestler as we said in a TV review (Horror, recovery – and a glimpse of a better world, 28 January, page 14, G2). • An article about the South Korean film director Bong Joon-ho referred to Sharon Choi as his translator. She is his interpreter (Art and Seoul, 31 January, page 8, G2). • Other recently corrected articles include: The Guardian view on Trump’s impeachment trial: the perils of outrageous immunity ‘It was like a movie’: the high school students who uncovered a toxic waste scandal Brazil counts the cost after highest recorded rainfall in 110 years
